subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire scored 30 points against Dwight Howard, who had 24 points and 18 rebounds and kept Stoudemire in foul trouble.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire scored 30 points against Dwight Howard, who had 24 points and 18 rebounds and kept Stoudemire in foul trouble.
